---
title: "verify"
---

This command identifies positive hit peptides from an ELIspot experiment.

```bash
usage: ace verify [-h] 
    --configuration-csv-file CONFIGURATION_CSV_FILE 
    --num-coverage NUM_COVERAGE
```

| Required Parameter          | Description                                                                               |
| --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--configuration-csv-file`  | ELIspot configuration CSV file. Expected columns: 'coverage_id', 'pool_id', 'peptide_id'. |
| `--num-coverage`            | Total coverage (i.e. number of peptide replicates).                                       |
